deadbeat.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who is lazy and has no plans in life
deadbeat.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who avoids paying their debts
deadbeat.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who does not pay their debts
deadbeat.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The government ought to think about how to get the money from the deadbeats before raising taxes on those who do pay.
